content.rendered:
YOUR TAX & LEGAL SERVICE PARTNER
At Book My Consultant we are focused on creating value for clients,
making compliance simple, affordable, and transparent
Get Started Call Now

About Us

We are one among India’s leading Legal & Professional Services partners to help entrepreneurs, Start-up’s, Taxpayers, Business, to easily start and grow their business with one-click access for all legal compliance & Advisory services.

Know More

Featured Services

Some of our featured services include incorporation, government registrations & filings, accounting, documentation, and annual compliances

Proprietorship Firm

A Sole proprietorship is a popular business form due to its simplicity, ease of setup, and nominal cost also which is owned, managed, and controlled by one person. it’s ideal for small traders and merchants.

VIEW PAGE

Limited Liability Partnership

A limited liability partnership is a business entity, most commonly called LLP that resembles both partnership and company also combines the benefits of both the entity in a single form of organization.  
VIEW PAGE

Private Limited Company

Private Limited Companies are those entities that are privately held by a minimum of two persons. Many start-ups register as a Private Limited Company as it is the only form of organization to get seed funding.

VIEW PAGE

Account & Bookkeeping

Book My Consultants offers you options for better management of your accounting and bookkeeping functions. Our team will help you realize improved profitability through efficiency gains and robust accounting and bookkeeping solutions
VIEW PAGE

GST Return Filing

Filing of GST Return is mandatory for all business who has acquired GST Registration. Get your GST Return filled by Book My Consultants from anywhere in India. Get in touch with us and we will assist you with the entire process.

VIEW PAGE

Trademark Registration

Trademark registration is often obtained for a business name, distinctive catchy phrases, taglines, or captions. The owner of the trademark has exclusive rights to use their mark about the categories they’re registered in.
VIEW PAGE

Why Book My Consunltant ?

It is with consistent services and results that build trust with the people and that successively help us to serve the business better.

Experienced Team

The extensively experienced team is determined to render result-oriented legal services.

Expert CA/CS Assistance

Prompt support from our in-house expert professionals.

Confidential & Safe

All your private information is safe with us

Outstanding Outcomes

Affordable pricing to connect with the client’s needs and ensuring outstanding outcomes.

Happy Customers

We take pride! Not in our work, but in your words.

Never thought that income tax filing is going to be very easy but with the assistance of Book My Consultant experts, it had been very easy. Book My Consultant is a heart-winning tax consultancy service provider.

Bert Baldwin

Enquired them for a general doubt about IEC code and that they immediately start helping even without pushing for taking their services, Really appreciated & Highly recommended.

Priyanka Pareek

Great experience with book my consultant's team. LLP Incorporation process was very smooth and transparent also their service fee is very reasonable.

Ridhi Mantri

Last three months I used to be confused to file my returns, BMC Team quick responses made my return enter three days of interaction. Good luck to you & your team

Nooruddin Shaikh

They are a team of highly professional consultants. They need to help me in completing the legal formalities of My new start-up business. I might definitely consult them for all legal matters of my Company as they're well worth the time & money.

Aanandi Agarwal

Book My Consultant team has always been easy to urge hold of and happy to assist with any queries I even have had regarding my GST Return Filing. the simplest consultants thus far.

Ramesh Pareek

Book My Consultants In Numbers

80

Services Offered

3470

Businesses Served

250

Enquires monthly

100%

Satisfaction Guarantee

Some of our Clients

We Support & Recognised By

Startup India
We support the Startup India initiative that aims to accelerate entrepreneurship in the country and create startups.
Digital India
We support the Digital India initiative for digitizing Government activities and helping improve digital literarcy.
Make In India
We support the Make in India initiative that encourages and facilitates foreign investment into the country.
MSME

We support Micro, Small and Medium Enterprise that aims to boost up enterpreneurship in the country and generate employment.

Let’s start your business journey with Book My Consultant.

Interested
